entry.message: [info] Activation of plug-in XBRL rule processor (xule) successful, version Check version using Tools->Xule->Version on the GUI or --xule-version on the command line. - xule

[DQC.IFRS.0102.9543] Gesamtergebnis with a value of 509,400,000 is not equal to the combined total of Gewinn (Verlust) and Sonstiges Ergebnis ( 480,000,000 + 29,300,000 ) with a value of 509,300,000.
These values should be equal. The properties of this ifrs-full:ComprehensiveIncome fact are: Period :2021-01-01 to 2021-12-31 Dimensions : Unit : EUR Decimals of Gesamtergebnis : 1 Decimals of Gewinn (Verlust) : 1 Decimals of Sonstiges Ergebnis : 1
Rule Element Id:9543 Rule version: 17.0.2 - https://filings.xbrl.org/529900S9YO2JHTIIDG38/2021-12-31/ESEF/AT/1/bawaggroup-2021-12-31-de.zip/bawaggroup-2021-12-31-de/reports/bawaggroup-2021-12-31-de.xhtml 4469
